item.title: make magazine podcast
item.description: make magazine has a pretty cool podcast (iTMS link)suitable for tinkerers of all ages—everything from robots to making a wallet out of tape. most of the episodes are video, some are audio or “enhance

item.title: another opportunity for you video artists
item.description: polymer is an exibition of contemporary video works in october. the entry deadline is september 15, and there is a $15 entry fee. check it out here.

item.title: refreshed links page--need more!
item.description: i have updated the links page and added some local links, but mostly in the arts field. please send in any that i can add that are interesting in your field of interest!

item.title: who is pam?
item.description: the better question is “what is pam?” pam (perpetual art machine) is an online repository of image and video art. artists can join and submit their works, which are tagged with keywords. pam is als
